Description: Two fragments of a pottery ostracon bearing 5 lines of Greek text, perhaps containing Psalm 100.7.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr William Yewdale Adams
Bibliographic references: Adams 2002 / Merinarti III: The Late and Terminal Christian Phases (91, pl.29c)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (395072) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/395072)
